Container.Name: ComfyUI-Nvidia-Docker
Container.Overview:
ComfyUI WebUI Dockerfile with Nvidia support, built from the latest official ComfyUI GitHub release
The tool will create many directories inside the "run directory": HF, data/{input,output,temp}, user, models/{checkpoints,clip,clip_vision,configs,controlnet,diffusers,embeddings,gligen,hypernetworks,loras,photomaker,style_models,unet,upscale_models,vae,vae_approx}
All those folders will be created with the WANTED_UID and WANTED_GID parameters (by default using Unraid's default of 99:100) allowing the end-user to place directly into the folders their checkpoints, unet, lora and other required models.
Output files will be placed into the data/output folder.
Please see https://github.com/mmartial/ComfyUI-Nvidia-Docker for further details.

Config.Name: WANTED_UID
Config.Description: UID to use for content in run directory

Config.Name: WANTED_GID
Config.Description: GID to use for content in run directory
